items.sentence: I think breakfast is the most important meal of the day.
I\'m worried about what\'ll happen if Tom doesn\'t come.
I don\'t think Tom knows anybody who\'s able to do that.
Tom would often talk about Mary when she wasn\'t around.
If you can\'t get a taxi, I\'ll take you to the airport.
Mary went to Boston where she met the man of her dreams.
Tom didn\'t even notice that Mary was flirting with him.
Tom didn\'t explain it well enough for me to understand.
It was the first time that Tom had ever been on a ferry.
Tom told me he\'s been living in Boston for three years.
